abstract: Watched as an indicator of whether weakness is seeping deeper into the economy, Disney said that operating income in its parks and resorts unit rose 33 percent.
snippet: Watched as an indicator of whether weakness is seeping deeper into the economy, Disney said that operating income in its parks and resorts unit rose 33 percent.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  Mickey Mouse, so far at least, is not a discretionary expense.

headline.main: No Signs of a Slowdown in Traffic at Disney’s Parks
headline.print_headline: No Signs of a Slowdown In Traffic at Disney’s Parks

abstract: CNBC interviews Robert A. Iger, Disney's chief executive, about the entertainment giant's better-than-expected earnings report.
snippet: CNBC interviews Robert A. Iger, Disney's chief executive, about the entertainment giant's better-than-expected earnings report.
lead_paragraph: CNBC interviews Robert A. Iger, Disney's chief executive, about the entertainment giant's better-than-expected earnings report.

abstract: Associated Press: The writers’ strike “raised prices in the spot ad market as the lull in network shows shrunk available ad time. That bodes well for the upcoming upfront sales presentation to advertising agencies in New York, which will affect pricing for the coming fall TV season, Disney Chief Executive Robert Iger said” on a conference call with analysts Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Associated Press: The writers’ strike “raised prices in the spot ad market as the lull in network shows shrunk available ad time. That bodes well for the upcoming upfront sales presentation to advertising agencies in New York, which will affect pricing for the coming fall TV season, Disney Chief Executive Robert Iger said” on a conference call with analysts Tuesday.

headline.main: Disney Sees Healthy Spot Ad Market
